Oh, the pink skin mayor guy.
Congratulations on winning the elections, I guess.
Good thing you dropped by.
You don't seem very happy to see me, though.
Okay, let me tell you one thing.
You might have become the mayor, for how little it counts here.
But that doesn't mean anyone will be jumping around you like you are some sort of prince.
Sheesh, you got me there.
Now, you gonna have to work hard to get anything reasonable done around here.
And neither of you looks like you are used to working on your own.
You can call me Flak and I'm the head of our only worker guild.
You pay me, I lend you workers to do whatever you need.
Pay you, but not them? This sounds an awful lot like slavery.
What a foul word for a young lady.
They are not slaves, they are workers. That's different.
What is?
The latter sounds better.
You have to feed them once in a while or they will stop working.
Actually, business wasn't so great recently.
You know what? Since you just started here, I'll let you have one worker as a gift.
Make sure to make some use of them. Goblins are shitty workers, so don't be shy of using a stick to discipline.
(Gulp)
Aren't you a goblin as well?
You bet. Good thing I'm not a worker, heh.
